metadata.title: CVE-2024-5691 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: By tricking the browser with a `X-Frame-Options` header, a sandboxed iframecould have presented a button that, if clicked by a user, would bypassrestrictions to open a new window. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127and Firefox ESR < 115.12.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
